abstract: Thomas O Kriegsmann, new director of programs at New York Live Arts, describes how he is expanding dance organization's programming to include more experimental and risky works as it begins its first season under his direction.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kriegsmann, the director of programs, discusses his vision for Live Arts as the first dance performance of his inaugural season begins on Wednesday.

headline.main: At New York Live Arts, Thomas O. Kriegsmann Is Ready to Take Risks
headline.print_headline: Embracing Risk as a Strategy for Presenting Dance

snippet: Mr. Kriegsmann, the director of programs, discusses his vision for Live Arts as the first dance performance of his inaugural season begins on Wednesday.

keywords.value: Bill T Jones/Arnie Zane Dance Co
